2026-01-05.content:
General infoType functionality and the following infoTypes are now available in all regions:

* `CREDIT_CARD_DATA`
* `DEMOGRAPHIC_DATA`
* `DRIVERS_LICENSE_NUMBER`
* `FINANCIAL_ID`
* `GEOGRAPHIC_DATA`
* `GOVERNMENT_ID`
* `MEDICAL_DATA`
* `MEDICAL_ID`
* `SECURITY_DATA`
* `TECHNICAL_ID`

For more information about all built-in infoTypes, see the [InfoType detector reference](https://docs.cloud.google.com/dlp/docs/infotypes-reference).

summary.title: New Sensitive Data Detection Capabilities
summary.summary: The system now offers expanded capabilities for detecting a wider range of sensitive data types, including financial, medical, and identification information, across all operational regions. This enhancement allows for more comprehensive data protection and compliance.

2025-12-15.content: The `OBJECT_TYPE/PERSON/FACE` infoType detector is available in [Preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages) in `global` and the `asia`, `europe`, and `us` multi-regions. For more information about all infoTypes, see [InfoType detector reference](https://cloud.google.com/sensitive-data-protection/docs/infotypes-reference).

summary.title: New Person Face Detection InfoType
summary.summary: The OBJECT_TYPE/PERSON/FACE infoType detector is now in Preview across multiple regions. This feature enhances sensitive data protection by identifying personal faces within your data. Explore the InfoType detector reference for a comprehensive list of supported sensitive data types.

2025-11-23.content: The `KOREA_NHI_NUMBER` infoType detector is available in all regions. For more information about all built-in infoTypes, see the [InfoType detector reference](https://cloud.google.com/dlp/docs/infotypes-reference).

summary.title: KOREA_NHI_NUMBER detector now available in all regions
summary.summary: The KOREA_NHI_NUMBER infoType detector is now available in all regions, expanding its reach for sensitive data detection.

2025-11-07.content:
The following infoType detectors are available in `global` and the `europe` and
`us` multi-regions:

* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/CONTEXT/FINANCE`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/CONTEXT/HEALTH`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/CONTEXT/LEGAL`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/CONTEXT/OBSCENE`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/CONTEXT/OFFENSIVE`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/CONTEXT/POLITICS`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/CONTEXT/RELIGION`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/CONTEXT/SEXUAL`

For more information about all infoTypes, see [InfoType
detector reference](https://cloud.google.com/sensitive-data-protection/docs/infotypes-reference).

summary.title: New infoType detectors now available
summary.summary: Explore new finance, health, and legal infoType detectors, among others, now accessible in global and multi-regions.

2025-11-03.content: The `OBJECT_TYPE/PERSON/PASSPORT` and `OBJECT_TYPE/PERSON/PHOTO_ID_CARD` infoType detectors are available in `global` and the `asia`, `europe`, and `us` multi-regions. For more information about all infoTypes, see [InfoType detector reference](https://cloud.google.com/sensitive-data-protection/docs/infotypes-reference).

summary.title: New detectors for IDs and passports
summary.summary: New detectors for identifying passport and photo ID card information are now available in global, asia, europe, and us multi-regions.

2025-10-27.content: The `NEW_ZEALAND_DRIVERS_LICENSE_NUMBER` infoType detector is available in all regions. For more information about all built-in infoTypes, see the [InfoType detector reference](https://cloud.google.com/dlp/docs/infotypes-reference).

summary.title: New detector available
summary.summary: The New Zealand Drivers License Number detector is now available in all regions.

2025-10-17.content:
Customers with an organization-level activation of Security Command Center
Premium have an organization-level discovery subscription
at no charge from Sensitive Data Protection. For more information, see
[Sensitive data discovery in Security Command Center
Premium](https://docs.cloud.google.com/security-command-center/docs/activate-sensitive-data-discovery#sensitive-data-discovery-scc-premium).

summary.title: Security Command Center Premium
summary.summary: Get a free Sensitive Data Protection discovery subscription with Security Command Center Premium.

2025-10-10.content: The `BRAZIL_RG_NUMBER` infoType detector is available in all regions. For more information about all built-in infoTypes, see the [InfoType detector reference](https://cloud.google.com/dlp/docs/infotypes-reference).

summary.title: BRAZIL_RG_NUMBER detector now available in all regions
summary.summary: The `BRAZIL_RG_NUMBER` infoType detector is now available for use in all regions, enhancing data protection capabilities across diverse geographical locations.

2025-10-02.content:
This is an addition to the May 1 release note announcing the deprecation of the
ability to send inspection and discovery results from Sensitive Data Protection
to Data Catalog.

If you have workflows that create inspection jobs or job triggers and set the
deprecated
[`PublishFindingsToCloudDataCatalog`](https://cloud.google.com/sensitive-data-protection/docs/reference/rest/v2/Action#publishfindingstoclouddatacatalog)
action, you must update those workflows by January 30, 2026. On or after this
date, new jobs and job triggers that are created by those workflows will fail.

summary.title: Sensitive Data Protection: Data Catalog Integration Deprecation
summary.summary: The ability to send inspection and discovery results from Sensitive Data Protection to Data Catalog is being deprecated. Update workflows using the 'PublishFindingsToCloudDataCatalog' action by January 30, 2026, to avoid job failures.

2025-09-22.content: The `DOCUMENT_TYPE/FINANCE/INVOICE` and `DOCUMENT_TYPE/MEDICAL/RECORD` infoType detectors are available in `global` and the `asia`, `europe`, and `us` multi-regions. For more information about all infoTypes, see [InfoType detector reference](https://cloud.google.com/sensitive-data-protection/docs/infotypes-reference).

summary.title: New infoType detectors for finance and medical records
summary.summary: The DOCUMENT_TYPE/FINANCE/INVOICE and DOCUMENT_TYPE/MEDICAL/RECORD infoType detectors are now available in global and multi-regions. Check the InfoType detector reference for more details.

2025-09-19.content: When you inspect a BigQuery table for sensitive data, you can send the inspection findings to Dataplex Universal Catalog. For more information, see [Send inspection results to Dataplex Universal Catalog as aspects](https://cloud.google.com/sensitive-data-protection/docs/add-aspects-inspection-job).

summary.title: Dataplex Catalog Integration
summary.summary: Inspect BigQuery tables for sensitive data and send findings to Dataplex Universal Catalog.

2025-09-08.content: Fixed the issue preventing Sensitive Data Protection from detecting sensitive data in the headers and footers of certain rich document types.

summary.title: Sensitive Data Protection: Issue Fixed
summary.summary: An issue that prevented Sensitive Data Protection from detecting sensitive data in the headers and footers of certain rich document types has been resolved.

2025-09-02.content: When configuring schedules for Cloud Storage data discovery, you can select data based on specific tags. For more information, see [Profile Cloud Storage data in an organization or folder](https://cloud.google.com/sensitive-data-protection/docs/profile-org-folder-cloud-storage) or [Profile Cloud Storage data in a single project](https://cloud.google.com/sensitive-data-protection/docs/profile-project-cloud-storage).

summary.title: New: Filter data discovery by tag
summary.summary: You can now select specific tags when configuring schedules for Cloud Storage data discovery.

2025-08-29.content: The August 25 release note announcing the release of the `DOCUMENT_TYPE/FINANCE/INVOICE` and `DOCUMENT_TYPE/MEDICAL/RECORD` infoType detectors was published in error. These infotypes are not available.

summary.title: InfoType detectors released in error
summary.summary: The recently published release note about the `DOCUMENT_TYPE/FINANCE/INVOICE` and `DOCUMENT_TYPE/MEDICAL/RECORD` infoType detectors was published in error. These detectors are not yet available.

2025-08-25.content: The `DOCUMENT_TYPE/FINANCE/INVOICE` and `DOCUMENT_TYPE/MEDICAL/RECORD` infoType detectors are available in `global` and the `asia`, `europe`, and `us` multi-regions. For more information about all infoTypes, see [InfoType detector reference](https://cloud.google.com/sensitive-data-protection/docs/infotypes-reference).

summary.title: New infoType detectors available
summary.summary: The DOCUMENT_TYPE/FINANCE/INVOICE and DOCUMENT_TYPE/MEDICAL/RECORD infoType detectors are now available in global and the asia, europe, and us multi-regions.

2025-08-15.content: The `AUSTRIA_SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER` infoType detector is available in all regions. For more information about all built-in infoTypes, see the [InfoType detector reference](https://cloud.google.com/dlp/docs/infotypes-reference).

summary.title: New detector available
summary.summary: The AUSTRIA_SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER infoType detector is now available in all regions.

2025-08-15.content: During discovery operations, Sensitive Data Protection scans the contents of various archive files. For a list of supported file types, see [Supported file clusters in discovery operations](https://cloud.google.com/sensitive-data-protection/docs/supported-file-types#file_clusters).

summary.title: Archive Scanning
summary.summary: This feature scans archive files.

2025-08-13.content: You can configure Sensitive Data Protection to save the findings from an inspection job to a Cloud Storage bucket or folder. For more information, see [Save findings to Cloud Storage](https://cloud.google.com/sensitive-data-protection/docs/concepts-actions#save-findings-cloud-storage).

summary.title: Save Inspection Findings to Cloud Storage
summary.summary: This feature allows users to save sensitive data inspection findings to a Cloud Storage bucket or folder.

2025-08-04.content:
Sensitive Data Protection provides recommendations to optimize your infoType selections. In the Google Cloud console, if you select a specific infoType that is covered by a general infoType, Sensitive Data Protection recommends general infoTypes that you can use instead.

For information about the benefits of using general infoTypes, see [General and specific infoType detectors](https://cloud.google.com/sensitive-data-protection/docs/concepts-infotypes#general-specific-infotypes).

summary.title: InfoType Recommendations
summary.summary: Optimize your infoType selections with Sensitive Data Protection.

2025-08-01.content:
The following infoType detectors are available in all regions. For more information about all built-in infoTypes, see [InfoType detector reference](https://cloud.google.com/sensitive-data-protection/docs/infotypes-reference).

* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/C`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/CPP`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/CS`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/GO`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/HTML`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/JAVA`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/JAVASCRIPT`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/JSON`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/PHP`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/POWERSHELL`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/PYTHON`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/RUST`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/SHELL`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/SQL`
* `DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/TYPESCRIPT`

summary.title: New Languages Supported
summary.summary: Discover the expanded list of supported code languages for sensitive data detection.

2025-07-04.content:
Sensitive Data Protection can detect and redact the following object infoTypes in images:

* `OBJECT_TYPE/BARCODE`
* `OBJECT_TYPE/LICENSE_PLATE`
* `OBJECT_TYPE/PERSON`
* `OBJECT_TYPE/WHITEBOARD`

For more information, see the following:

* [Inspect an image for sensitive objects](https://cloud.google.com/sensitive-data-protection/docs/inspecting-images#inspect_an_image_for_sensitive_objects)
* [Object redaction](https://cloud.google.com/sensitive-data-protection/docs/redacting-sensitive-data-images#object-redaction)

summary.title: Sensitive data detection in images
summary.summary: Sensitive Data Protection now supports detecting and redacting sensitive content in images, including barcodes, license plates, people, and whiteboards.

2025-06-25.content: The `CZECHIA_PERSONAL_ID_NUMBER` infoType detector is available in all regions. For more information about all built-in infoTypes, see [InfoType detector reference](https://cloud.google.com/dlp/docs/infotypes-reference).

summary.title: New infoType detector available
summary.summary: The CZECHIA_PERSONAL_ID_NUMBER infoType detector is now available in all regions, enhancing data protection capabilities.
